statements.select: declare @n int select @n=COUNT(1) from QuickUseRecord where Uid=#Uid# and Qid=#Qid# if(@n>0) begin update QuickUseRecord set UseTimes=UseTimes+1 where Uid=#Uid# and Qid=#Qid# end else begin insert QuickUseRecord values(#Uid#,#Qid#,1,#Qtype#) end
delete from QuickUseRecord where Qid=#Qid# and Uid=#Uid#

declare @Qidsort nvarchar(200) select @Qidsort=(select ','+ CONVERT(varchar(10), Qid) from QuickUseRecord where Uid=#Uid# and Qtype=#Qtype# order by UseTimes desc for XML Path(''))+',' select * from Quickentry where QId in(select QId from QuickUseRecord where Uid=#Uid# and Qtype=#Qtype#) order by CHARINDEX(','+CONVERT(varchar(10), Qid) +',',@Qidsort )
